title: Major problem since downloading patch 7.15
body:
Ever since I downloaded patch 7.15 today I can't get through a game without randomly DCing! There will be absolutely no warning, no high ping, nothing. Just randomly it will be unable to connect and then have no choice but to exit the game and come back. It usually happens 3-5 times a game making it very difficult for myself and my team. 
I thought it could be my wifi but it has happened now in two completely different wifi networks. It again has only started happening since I downloaded patch 7.15 this morning. Was playing fine last night. 
How can I fix this? Could it be my computer? (I dont see how, the game was running perfectly fine on it yesterday)
I uninstalled and reinstalled it last week because the file size of the game was getting very large on my computer. Could that have something to do with it?
Please help!!!!!

replies.body: I'm having the same issue. I did not do any reinstalls recently and it has happened once a game starting today. My internet has not gone out at any point to cause the disconnection.
Having the same problems been playing lol for years and everyonce in awhile a patch comes along and fucks up my game play please riot fix this soon

If this is happening pretty randomly and you never actually see your ping or FPS spike, this could be a sign of some packet loss. Grab your network logs from a game that froze up like this and pop them into our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743). If you can grab a screenshot of what it says using something like Gyazo, post it here so that we can go over it together!

i have been tracking my fps and cpu and gpu temp. they were all fine. but after the recent patch 7.15 update (i'm in NA).. every game approx 5mins or so in..the game sound will suddenly cut out for 2 seconds then comes back and then the whole game freezes. it is frustrating as i have a decent new comp. i formatted and reinstalled windows already. and updated all drivers. so not sure what's wrong. 7.10 to 7.14 no problems at all.

I'm having the same issue. My ping is very good outside of League and i am testing it multiple times before i go in a game but since 2 days i don#t play matchmaking games at all because the ping gets high as soon as i am in a game. This is what the log reader says: 
Your average ping was 1045 milliseconds.
The worst ping you experienced was 8360ms. This means you experienced high ping during this game, which is likely where you were seeing issues. See below for a few recommendations to help out with this.
Your average percentage of packet loss for this game was 22.49%.

Overall, this means you had a high amount of packets lost during the game. This can be caused by various network issues, so please see below for a few common steps that can help reduce packet loss.
